title: Commercial Land For Sale In The Heart Of Anuradhapura Town
details:
Location: Bank Place, Anuradhapura town
(New town, Anuradhapura)
Land: 41.5P (Has a 6 roomed house), Rectangular, flat land
Frontage to the road: Approximately 75’
Access road Width: 20’


Special:
• Location is ideal for guest houses, restaurants, commercial institutions, medical centers, ware houses, boarding places….etc and for residing.
• Large free space for any use including parking facility for several heavy vehicles.
• Surrounded by a parapet wall
• Walking distance to all facilities for business and/ or living needs.
• Has Electricity, Pipe born water.
• CLEAR TITLES
• SELLING ONLY FOR LAND VALUE
• Price negotiable.

Contact : 0373133688
